programme.title: Wie Word 'n Miljoenêr?
programme.desc: 'S5/E6'. In herdie episode beland 'n Skotse boer in die vuurwarm stoel en bereik groot hoogtes. Gaan hy hierdie reeks se nuwe miljoenêr word?

programme.title: Govan Ontbloot
programme.desc: 'S1/E2'. Louis Liebenberg het hulle gelok om Namakwaland se diamante vir hom uit te delf. Hoe gaan dit nou met die 'Namakwa-pionne'?

programme.title: Magda Louw
programme.desc: 'S3/E4'. Na 'n lang uitgestelde gesprek, stap Magda die laan van herinnering, net om 'n skokkende bevinding te maak wat haar hele lewe verander.

programme.title: Jan Braai Vir Erfenis
programme.desc: 'S15/E5'. Wildsvleis is 'n ware lekkerny in Namibië. Jan Braai en die Ontspan gaan op 'n jagavontuur om verantwoordelik te jag en die vleis van begin tot einde voor te berei. Só eer hulle die dier en die natuur.

programme.title: Diepe Waters
programme.desc: 'S3/E179'. Arno het 'n groot verrassing vir Karla. Henry en Lettie ontvang 'n onverwagse aflewering. Bianca het 'n voorstel wat Gys beïndruk.

programme.title: Suidooster
programme.desc: 'S11/E91'. Die Samsodiens probeer om Bianca van plan te laat verander, terwyl Kate se stories oor Henog vir Siya omkrap. 'n Dubbelganger maak weer 'n verskyning.

programme.title: Lottoland Help 'n Dorp

programme.title: Moer 'n boer
programme.desc: 'S2/E2'. Vier uitdagings toets die boere: 2km draf, kragproewe, stoei-tegniek en boksvaardigheid. Dis 'n harde siftingsproses, net die sterkstes sal deurdring na die finale 28.

programme.title: Bravo!

programme.title: Hannes Aan Huis
programme.desc: 'S12/E5'. Hannes hoor hoe een van Suid-Afrika se bekendste ontkleedanseresse, Gigi, hoogtes bereik het na haar konserwatiewe grootwordjare in die Paarl tot eienares van haar eie ontkleeklub.

programme.title: In Gesprek
programme.desc: 'S10/E5'. Ons bespreek die Trump-tariewe wat op Suid-Afrika ingestel is, die jongste skandaal waarby adjunk-president Paul Mashatile betrek word en berig oor Johannesburg se groen-areas wat onder beleg is.

programme.title: Kom Ons Praat Daaroor
programme.desc: 'S6/E50'. Kom Ons Praat Daaroor se drie aanbieders het uiteenlopende persoonlikhede en opinies soos hulle oor nuusgebeure, snaakshede, hartstories en stories wat jou warm onder die kraag maak, gesels.

programme.title: Safari Roetes
programme.desc: 'S3/E4'. Die Sederberg is uiters ryk aan rotskuns en ons ry vanaf die Katbakkiespas, kamp by Mount Ceder en ry die Grootrivierpas na Eselbank. Die pas raak vreeslik nou en vereis spesiale vaardighede.

programme.desc: 'S12/E18'. ontbytSAKE se ateljeegas is die musikant Valiant Swart en ons SAKEfokus gaan oor landbou in die Overbergstreek.

programme.title: Reënboogrant
programme.desc: 'S1/E29 - In Die Kollig'. Sunette se gesondheid bly sukkel. Chris se invloed en verhoudings word bevraagteken, en daar is spanning tussen Shani en Rachelle oor Chris. Intussen het Dolf 'n plan om Bongi te help by die skool.

programme.title: Boer Soek 'n Vrou

programme.title: Bravo!
programme.desc: 'S15/E19'. Boer Soek 'n Vrou is terug en ons kuier by boer Daandré en sy Marisca wat liefde in die vorige seisoen gevind het. Die Vyftigers skop hul nasionale toer af en ons kuier op stel van Brendan Peyper se Rooivlag.

programme.title: Die Nuusmakers
programme.desc: 'S1/E11'. Sonia en Johan ontvang albei dreigemente, en Johan vra Renate vir finansiële hulp om op die storie te bly en hul sekuriteit op te skerp. Die druk op Adri neem van alle kante toe.

programme.title: Sê Jou Sê
programme.desc: 'S5/E4 of 12'. Ons bekyk bedrog rakende die afsterwe en begrafnisse van geliefdes.

programme.title: Suidooster

programme.title: Skemergrond

programme.title: Gqeberha: The Empire
programme.desc: 'S1/E188'. Anathi is determined to solve her problems with Thulani and decides to risk it all by visiting Bulelwa. Msimelelo is not ready for what's in store for him when furious Ntando shows up swinging a golf club.

programme.title: The River
programme.desc: 'S5/E28'. Lindiwe and Zweli's perfect little bubble is burst by a diamond and a blast from the past. Cobra's resistance to starting a new life takes another turn.

programme.title: News On Wethu
programme.desc: 'S3/E161'. The daily news bulletin covering the latest breaking news locally and internationally. Presented in IsiZulu and IsiXhosa, we bring you a new era of current and reliable news coverage.

programme.title: Against The Wall Podcast With Skeem GP
programme.desc: 'S1/E18'. Mananaphansi Mbokazi came to Johannesburg dreaming of becoming a journalist - but life had other plans. From a wrongful arrest to taxi wars, he shares his powerful true story of survival and lost dreams.

programme.title: Eya Madoda
programme.desc: 'S1/E2'. Siboniso Magoso feels caught in a complicated triangle with Amanda and her ex, Mduduzi. Although he's embraced Amanda's child as his own, he grows increasingly uneasy about Mduduzi's lingering influence.

programme.title: Youngins
programme.desc: 'S1/E5 - Game Time'. It's game time as Khaya and the boys play their first soccer match of the season. Buhle is a WAG in training, but her priorities are misplaced.

programme.title: My Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: 'S1/E99'. Nqubeko tries to confront his father about his pain but fails yet again. Puseletso tries to establish boundaries with Moketsi in vain. Sbu finds out that Koketso cheated on him.

programme.title: The River
programme.desc: 'S5/E29'. Lindiwe finds herself launching a whole lot more than her new acquisition. When she realises that talking has failed her, Angelina launches a new plan.

programme.title: DiepCity
programme.desc: 'S2/E64'. Nox berates Bra Pat for disrespecting Bonga, and he wants to introduce her to Nomaweni as his daughter.

programme.title: Gqeberha: The Empire
programme.desc: 'S1/E189'. Fundiswa shamelessly lusts over an oblivious Mbube. Zimkhitha discovers that Anathi is alive. Msimelelo is in a coma. Ntando feels guilty.

programme.title: Bring Aya Home
programme.desc: A young father discovers that his young daughter is sick. After failing to find a cure, he decides to consult traditional doctors.

programme.title: Icala
programme.desc: A woman goes on a quest to clear her name after being wrongfully convicted.

programme.title: Mmino Wa Lerato
programme.desc: A wayward teen falls in love with the lead singer of a church choir and joins to get close to her. When his friends find out, he must make a difficult choice.

programme.title: RSVP

programme.title: Impikiswano

programme.desc: A young father discovers that his young daughter is sick. After failing to find a cure, he decides to consult traditional doctors.

programme.title: Wa Lepelle
programme.desc: A generational curse has kept the Bokametse women in fear. Whenever one of the daughters is born with 'the mark', they eventually disappear into the Lepelle River.

programme.title: Uthando Noguluva
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Guluva is looking forward to being united with his sick son. However, his baby mama refuses him access to the boy.

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: When a man discovers his wife knows about his infidelity but doesn't confront him about it, he starts to believe that she might also be cheating.

programme.title: Makhe
programme.desc: A long-running feud between two former boxing rivals reaches a fever pitch when they become neighbours. Bab'Jomo is convinced that Bab'Edward cheated.

programme.title: Ke Bona Lerato

programme.desc: A young graduate believes his radio career will kick off because he has a degree. He soon realises it will take much more than a degree and hard work to get what he wants.

programme.title: Themba Lam

programme.title: Izinyoka
programme.desc: Two friends are retrenched due to old age but feel they are not at retirement stage. To survive, they start connecting electricity illegally.

programme.title: Inqubo Yothando

programme.title: Inkinga Uben
programme.desc: What began as a mission to stop her husband's wandering eye turns into a journey of self-discovery for a woman in a polygamous marriage.

programme.title: Mjolofontein
programme.desc: A romantic comedy that follows the journey of Koketso, a beloved social media influencer whose life turns unexpectedly when she discovers her sports presenter boyfriend is married.

programme.title: Phunyuka
programme.desc: When a shy lawyer finally admits his true feelings to his close friend, he loses her to another man. He then does everything in his power to win her heart.

programme.title: S'phila Njani
programme.desc: A girl seduced by a gang finds herself in a dilemma when she witnesses its leader shoot a boy she knows. She is torn between her freedom and helping the victim's family.

programme.desc: 'S1/E3 - Queen of The North'. Not all lions in the Savage Kingdom are born equal. While the Marsh Pride dominates the beating heart of the realm, the three lionesses of the Northern Pride struggle to hold their ground in the forests.

programme.desc: 'S11/E20 - One Last Chance'. As the sun fades across the land, Alaskans brace for Dark Winter's return.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7
programme.desc: 'S1/E2'. The team follow lions, leopards and cheetahs after a huge wildfire. The dominant male lions fight intruders, while the leopards and cheetahs struggle to get a meal.

programme.title: Where The Wild Men Are With Ben Fogle
programme.desc: 'S10/E5 - Zambia'. Ben journeys into Zambia to live with a British family who have built a safari lodge on the edge of a national park. Ben uncovers what motivates them to keep going.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: 'S10/E3 - Frigid Fortitudes'. As winter's presence descends upon Alaska, its residents endure battles of wit and nature, learning valuable lessons from both as they progress.

programme.title: Ancient Egypt By Train
programme.desc: 'S1/E3'. Alice takes the train to Luxor to see Tutankhamun's tomb and his mummified body in the Valley of the Kings. She also takes a walk along the Avenue of the Sphinxes.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America
programme.desc: 'S1/E3'. Simon travels from the ancient city of Machu Picchu in Peru to La Paz in Bolivia, the highest capital city on Earth, visiting cocaine farms and gold mines along the way.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: 'S7/E2 - Massacre on Hadrian's Wall'. Hadrian's Wall once formed the N/W frontier of the Roman Empire. However new evidence reveals how the ruthless Roman military crossed over and took the fight to their enemy.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys
programme.desc: 'S1/E10 - Singapore'. Michael Portillo's railway tour reaches its final stop - Singapore. Michael walks the streets of Chinatown with a local artist and uncovers the history of the Chinese community there.

programme.title: Ancient Egypt By Train
programme.desc: 'S1/E4'. Alice ends her adventure in Aswan, whose quarries provided the granite for the country's vast collection of Ancient Egyptian monuments. She then takes a boat to see the extraordinary Philae Temple.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: 'S7/E3 - Underwater Stonehenge'. Stonehenge, the site whose origins have baffled historians for centuries. Yet now, a discovery on the bed of the Mediterranean sea floor could hold some new clues.

programme.title: Solar System
programme.desc: 'S1/E3 - Storm Worlds'. Professor Brian Cox explores the solar system's wildest weather, encountering powerful lightning, strange metallic frosts and monsoon rains on a moon a billion kilometres from Earth.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild
programme.desc: 'S4/E6 - Revisit: Suffolk'. Join Ben as he revisits Will Lord, a true British caveman, in Suffolk's woodlands. Discover how Will's prehistoric dreams have evolved over three years and how his loved ones embrace this lifestyle.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: 'S12/E1 - Series 12, Episode 1'. Sue Aikens sorts her plumbing before the pipes freeze. Ricko spots some moose on the way to laying traps for wolverines. Chip Hailstone and his daughters go fishing, Alaskan style.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: 'S1/E66 - Secrets of a Dog's Nose'. A dog's sense of smell can do amazing things. Dogs can help humans sniff out all kinds of things that improve our lives, explosives, missing persons, illegal drugs.

programme.desc: 'S3/E108 - Born Yesterday'. Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.desc: 'S1/E24 - Trouble Bubbles'. Supertato and Evil Pea get stuck inside a giant bubble together. They float through the air until Supertato and Evil Pea pop the bubble by driving it into a supermarket sign.

programme.title: Grade 12 Physical Science
programme.desc: 'S3/E17 - Electrostatics'. In this episode, we will focus on Coulomb's law, electrostatic force, electric fields and two point charges.

programme.title: Grade 12 Physical Science
programme.desc: 'S3/E18 - Current Electricity, Direct Current'. In this episode, we will focus on current, ohm's law revision, emf and internal resistance.

programme.title: Grade 12 Physical Science
programme.desc: 'S3/E19 - Alternating Current'. In this episode, we will focus on motors, generators, alternating currents and electrical power.

programme.title: Grade 12 Physical Science
programme.desc: 'S3/E20 - Optical Phenomena and Properties of material. Photoelectric Effect'. We focus on the photoelectric effect, the threshold frequency of a metal, the work function of a metal, line emissions and absorption spectra.

programme.title: Grade 12 Physical Science
programme.desc: 'S3/E21 - Electrochemical Reactions. Galvanic Cells'. In this episode, we will focus on oxidation numbers, redox equations and reduction oxidation reactions.

programme.title: Grade 12 Physical Science
programme.desc: 'S3/E22 - Electrochemical Reactions. Electrolytic Cells'. In this episode, we will focus on electrolytic cells, comparing electrolytic and galvanic cells, applications of electrolysis and aluminium.

programme.title: Big School Afrikaans
programme.desc: 'S1/E6'. A collection of locally produced animation in the Afrikaans Language aimed at pre school level, made by Africans for Africans.

programme.title: Big School English
programme.desc: 'S1/E5'. A collection of locally produced animation aimed at preschool level, made by Africans for Africans.

programme.title: Big School IsiXhosa
programme.desc: 'S1/E6'. A collection of locally produced animation in the IsiXhosa Language aimed at pre school level, made by Africans for Africans.

programme.title: Mathematics Teacher Talk
programme.desc: 'S1/E27 - Teaching Statistics'. In this episode, we speak about teaching statistics in Grade 8 and 9. We discuss measures of central tendency and how these ideas can be conveyed effectively.

programme.title: Grade 2 Great Lesson Ideas
programme.desc: 'S1 - Data Handling Episode 1'. A Grade 2 class and teacher help us get lesson ideas during their lesson on Data Handling. This lesson has two episodes.

programme.title: Grade 1 Literacy
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Hooray For Handwriting: Capital Letters'. We learn to write capital letters. To get lesson notes on this episode send a whatsapp to +27 60 070 3328 with the code G1T3W3E2.

programme.title: Grade 2 Literacy
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Phonics: oi and oy'. We learn to use phonics like oi and oy.

programme.title: Grade 3 Literacy
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Pronouns'. We learn to use pronouns.

programme.title: Incremental Introduction of...
programme.desc: 'Incremental Introduction of African Languages (IIAL). S1/E20 - IsiXhosa Lesson 10 Episode 2'. This program aims to offer children a chance to learn the African languages of IsiXhosa and IsiZulu, in a fun and interactive way.

programme.title: Grade 4 Language
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Construction of simple sentences'. We learn to construct simple sentences.

programme.title: Grade 5 Language
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Deliciously Descriptive Adjectives'. We learn to use adjectives.

programme.title: Grade 6 Language
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Using Proper Nouns'. We learn to use proper nouns.

programme.title: Grade 7 Mathematics
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Using mathematical language Episode 2'. We learn about using mathematical language. This lesson has two episodes.

programme.title: Grade 7 Natural Science
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Potential And Kinetic Energy: Energy Transfers In Mechanical Systems'. We learn about potential and kinetic energy, looking mainly at energy transfers in mechanical systems.

programme.title: Big School English
programme.desc: 'S1/E6'. A collection of locally produced animation aimed at preschool level, made by Africans for Africans.

programme.title: Grade 8 Mathematics
programme.desc: 'S2/E18 - Algebraic Expressions: Collecting Like Terms'. We look at the use of commutative, associative and distributive laws. Add and subtract like terms. Multiply integers and monomials by monomials, binomials and trinomials.

programme.title: Grade 9 Mathematics
programme.desc: 'S3/E55 - Finding the Equation of a Graph'. In this episode, we look at different methods for determining the equation of a straight line.

programme.title: Grade 10 Physical Science
programme.desc: 'S2/E11 - Representing Chemical Change'. In this episode, we will be looking at how to represent the chemical changes that take place within atoms.

programme.title: Grade 11 Physical Science
programme.desc: 'S2/E16 - Quantitative aspects of chemical change'. In this episode, we will focus on. percentage yield, empirical and molecular formula, ammonium nitrate mining, combustion of petrol, sodium azide reaction and acid base reactions.

programme.desc: 'Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa'. Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the region's trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse With Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: 'E1'. Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Sonali Basak deliver the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.desc: 'S10/E11 - Maryland Governor Wes Moore'. Maryland Governor Wes Moore. David Rubenstein in conversation with Maryland Governor Wes Moore.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer
programme.desc: 'S5/E1 - Luisa Gómez Bravo'. BBVA CFO Luisa Gómez Bravo spearheads the Spanish bank's efforts to drive growth through digital innovation, expansion in corporate investment banking.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping today's complex economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Close
programme.desc: Alix Steel, Romaine Bostick and Scarlet Fu own the market-moving breaking news around the closing bell in this must-watch daily program to get an edge on equities, earnings and the economy.
